description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement to provide essential health care and reasonable access to non-essential health care for inmates. The objective is to provide training to 150 front line nurses on Clinical Protocols for Emergency Situations. The training will include high-fidelity clinical simulations, lab opportunities, and provision of support during all clinical simulation sessions. The scope includes, but is not limited to, simulation time, rooms, equipment, technical support, instructors, consumables, and training materials. The contract period is from the date of contract award to March 31, 2028. \
full_summary:
### Tender for Nursing Clinical Simulation Training

#### Solicitation Information

* **Government Tender ID**: 21201-24-4468614
* **Reference Number**: CB-175-10506671
* **Publication Date**: October 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 23, 2023 at 13:00:00
* **Contract Period**: November 1, 2023 to March 31, 2028

#### Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking a supplier to provide nursing clinical simulation training for its front-line nurses in the Atlantic region. The training will include simulation scenarios for emergency situations, such as altered level of consciousness, anaphylaxis, burns, and cardiac arrest, among others. The supplier must provide a minimum of 2 full-day training sessions per year for a maximum of 150 nurses, including setup, simulation, and debriefing.

#### Scope of Work

* Develop and deliver simulation-based medical training sessions for front-line nurses
* Schedule and attend meetings with CSC Health Services representatives to review content and ensure applicability
* Provide simulation time, including rooms and equipment, setup and cleanup, technical support, instructors, and consumables
* Train nurses on updated nursing protocols and technical skills required to enact protocols for emergency situations

#### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

#### Contact Information

* **Bidder Support**: Sylvie Gallant (506) 378-8724, [Sylvie.Gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Sylvie.Gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca)

#### Additional Resources

* Complete Statement of Work and Evaluation Criteria available at [Canada buys/tender opportunities website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
* Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) seminars for businesses interested in selling goods and services to the Government of Canada (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/event-calendar)
